entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
